talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
The Holy Light Crystal only shines in your hands so can you please hold it up for a while?
I'll reflect the light using my mirror.
<html>$Way of Purification$</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
I see a Priestess of Darkness like me in the mirror.
She's wearing a white robe... I've never seen her before. But there's no Priestess of Darkness that I don't know about...

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
This is confusing. But what is certain is that the Holy Light Crystal will teach you how to purify the corrupted Dark Avenger.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
I failed to guide him and I don't know how to guide you too. All I can tell you is to follow the Holy Light Crystal.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
….
(Meet Priestess of Darkness Rosetta.)

$Dark Avenger Stained With Nightmare$
Krrrgh.
(He seems to be having a hard time. You should leave quickly.)

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
You are not ready yet.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
I can see it in the mirror that Priestess of Darkness Parfait is at Riverwort Wharf now.
Please go to Riverwort Wharf and meet Priestess of Darkness Parfait.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The Holy Light Crystal guided me to you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
The nightmare is getting bigger and bigger. The moment the nightmare becomes a reality, this world will break apart.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
I know that the Priestesses of Darkness in Lagendia created the Holy Light Crystal. That light is the torch that will guide you through the storm that you are about to go through.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
What we are about to face is a massive darkness that is powerful enough to engulf light.
It is a nightmare created by a distortion of the strong will to save someone. It is all the more difficult to be controlled since it started from goodwill.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
{user_nick}, you are the one who will guide the darkness that has lost its way.
However, what the Priestesses of Darkness have is mere willpower that pales in comparison to the powerful darkness.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
If things go wrong, we could get swept by the storm of darkness and become a nightmare too.
Are you ready to enter that dangerous path?

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
I knew you would say that. Now we are about to witness the nasty grudge of darkness.
The grudge will bring out our weakness, fear, and anger.
The only one who has the solution to fight against all that is yourself.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
Please trust your willpower and give me your hand holding the Holy Light Crystal.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
Your friends are around. Are you planning to push your friends into the storm of darkness too?
Please spare a thought for the safety of your friends.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
You are not ready yet.
Please come back after training a little more.

* You can take the last ordeal when you reach Lv50.

$Dark Avenger Stained With Nightmare$
Krrgh….
(It looks like he might pull out his dagger and attack anytime. Talk to Priestess of Darkness Parfait.)

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
Oh no, the poor soul.
Things have come to this stage.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
When there is darkness, there is light. You have the power to bring him back to his correct path.
{user_nick}, please guide him with light before he gets swept away by nightmare and destroys this world.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
We can turn him back if we get rid of the nightmare that is controlling his body.
If you lose the battle against him, you could become a nightmare too. Are you ready to take the risk?

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
Now we will enter the abyss of darkness. Please win the battle against him.
When you have purified him, the holy power of light will become yours.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
If things go wrong, we could get swept by the storm of darkness and become a nightmare too.
Are you ready to enter that dangerous path?

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
Your friends are around. Are you planning to push your friends into the storm of darkness too?
Please spare a thought for the safety of your friends.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

$Priestess of Darkness Parfait$
Now we will enter the abyss of darkness. Please win the battle against him.
When you have purified him, the holy power of light will become yours.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's here. Huh? What happened? This is….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
You're finally back! I was worried because you didn't come back for a long time.
Did you meet the person at Riverwort Wharf? What happened to the Holy Light Crystal?

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
This is not a Holy Light Crystal, but a Crackstone… What happened?
It's not you who should have this, it's someone else….

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
I'm very confused. The Inner World where everyone is asleep...? It's something I can't even imagine. Could it be that you were dreaming?

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
It's hard to believe that it's true. But... the person who was losing his consciousness due to nightmare has recovered.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
He said a girl shining in white light shot an arrow towards his heart and all the nightmare that was tormenting him disappeared.
He met the girl in his dream.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is it possible for me to meet him?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
Well... But your face has brightened up unlike before.
It's almost like the Holy Light Crystal. I can feel the light that is spreading from deep inside your soul.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
The man resorted to joining the dark side in order to save this world. I don't know how this world will view him...
Please keep the stories about him to yourself.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
But can you give me the Crackstone?
It will help him never to get swept by darkness again.
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

Though the Holy Light Crystal disappeared, you can feel that it still exists deep in your heart.
Could it be that you now have the power to fight against the darkness like what Priestess of Darkness Parfait said?
* You have awakened into a Silver Hunter. Please open the skill window and check your skills.

qstep_change.comment: 전투 마치면 스탭, 저널 정보 변경

journal.title: Guidance of the Holy Light Crystal
journal.contents:
Meet Priestess of Darkness Rosetta who can control the Holy Light Crystal and discuss what to do next.


Saint Haven → Priestess of Darkness Rosetta
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Priestess of Darkness Rosetta

journal.title: Meet Priestess of Darkness Parfait again
journal.contents:
According to the Holy Light Crystal, Priestess of Darkness Parfait seems to have appeared at Riverwort Wharf. Meet Priestess of Darkness Parfait and find a way to save the Dark Avenger.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf → Priestess of Darkness Parfait
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Priestess of Darkness Parfait
journal.todo_msg: (Solo) Talk to Priestess of Darkness Parfait at Riverwort Wharf.

journal.title: Inner World
journal.contents:
Use the power of the Holy Light Crystal to enter the Inner World with Priestess of Darkness Parfait.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf - Priestess of Darkness Parfait - Inner World
journal.destination: (Solo) Enter the Inner World with Priestess of Darkness Parfait
journal.todo_msg: (Solo) Enter the Inner World with Priestess of Darkness Parfait.

journal.title: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Parfait
journal.contents:
When you entered the Inner World, you saw the Dark Avenger and Priestess of Darkness Parfait. Talk to Priestess of Darkness Parfait.
* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf (Inner World) - Priestess of Darkness Parfait
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Parfait at the Dimensional Gap
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Parfait again at the Inner World

journal.title: Duel with Dark Avenger
journal.contents:
With Priestess of Darkness Parfait's guide, you can fight the Dark Avenger who has been stained by nightmare.

Riverwort Wharf (Inner World) - Duel with Dark Avenger
journal.destination: (Solo) Duel with Dark Avenger at the Inner World
journal.todo_msg: Duel with Dark Avenger at the Inner World.

journal.title: Way of Purification
journal.contents:
You have gained a new power through the battle with the Dark Avenger.
Go to Saint Haven and let Priestess of Darkness Rosetta know.

Saint Haven - Priestess of Darkness Rosetta
journal.destination: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Rosetta
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Rosetta.
